sent.orig: Products: Accommodation. Teacher training services Accommodation. Teacher training services. Service.
sent.trans: 经营范围：住宿。教师培训服务。服务。

sent.orig: Conclusion Tonic accommodation: tonic accommodation for low and medium myopia was lower than for emmetropia.
sent.trans: 结论张力性调节：对于正视眼组和近视眼组，正视眼组张力性调节值高于近视眼组。

sent.orig: Do you have a hotel accommodation?
Is a set accommodation, catering, entertainment, business, shopping in one multi-functional hotel.
sent.trans: 是一座集住宿、餐饮、娱乐、商务、购物于一体的多功能酒店。

sent.orig: Location, preferential price, is your best travel tourism accommodation.
sent.trans: 地理位置优越，价格特惠，是你旅游出行的最佳住处。
